abstract: An array that contains the buffer mutability options for a render pipeline’s vertex function.
overview:
## Discussion

This property returns an array of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPipelineBufferDescriptor] instances, where each element corresponds to the same index in the buffer argument table for the render pipeline’s vertex function.
